abstract: Premier Oil said it will take a 50-percent interest and assume operatorship of Block 22/19c in the Central North Sea after reaching an agreement with Serica Energy, Reuters reported.
snippet: Premier Oil said it will take a 50-percent interest and assume operatorship of Block 22/19c in the Central North Sea after reaching an agreement with Serica Energy, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Premier Oil said it would take a 50 percent interest and assume operatorship of Block 22/19c in the Central North Sea after reaching an agreement with Serica Energy, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Premier Takes 50 Percent Stake in North Sea Block
